channel.title: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: a secret
item.description: This lists all pages that are hidden from the home page. This includes pages that define hidden=true in their frontmatter as well as descendents of hidden pages. When giving term pages, you should give it a title. Otherwise it will print out a warning and will use the urlized title, which may looks weird. While internally this term is called hidden, it is referenced in the resulting english pages as a secret and as hush, matey in the piratish translation.
